mapper.select: /* 육성공간 리스트 조회 */ SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNUMBER , PLC_PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT PLC_SN , PLC_NM FROM KB_PLC_INFO ORDER BY PLC_SN ASC ) PLC_PAGE ORDER BY ROWNUMBER DESC

/* 육성공간 상세 조회 */ SELECT PLC.PLC_SN AS PLC_SN , PLC.PLC_NM AS PLC_NM , PLC.PLC_ADDR AS PLC_ADDR , PLC.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN1 AS ATCH_FILE_SN1 , FILES1.FILE_PATH AS PLC_PATH1 , FILES1.FILE_NM AS PLC_FILE_NAME1 , PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN2 AS ATCH_FILE_SN2 , FILES2.FILE_PATH AS PLC_PATH2 , FILES2.FILE_NM AS PLC_FILE_NAME2 , PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN3 AS ATCH_FILE_SN3 , FILES3.FILE_PATH AS PLC_PATH3 , FILES3.FILE_NM AS PLC_FILE_NAME3 FROM KB_PLC_INFO PLC , KB_FILE_INFO FILES1 , KB_FILE_INFO FILES2 , KB_FILE_INFO FILES3 WHERE PLC.PLC_SN = #{plc_sn} AND PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN1 = FILES1.FILE_SN(+) AND PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN2 = FILES2.FILE_SN(+) AND PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN3 = FILES3.FILE_SN(+)
